tagline: The Future of WhatsApp Business Management

Dashboard.purpose: A high-level command center for your business communication status.
Dashboard.how_to: Use the toggle at the top to switch between daily and monthly views of your message throughput.

Campaigns.purpose: Broadcasting messages to large groups of contacts efficiently.
Campaigns.how_to: Click '+ New Campaign', name your broadcast, select a contact group, choose a template (or write your own), and hit 'Launch' to start sending instantly.

Automation.purpose: A visual drag-and-drop builder for automated customer journeys and bots.
Automation.how_to: Drag a 'Trigger' node onto the canvas. Connect it to a 'Message' node. All messages matching your keyword will now get that automated reply automatically.

Chats.purpose: The core inbox where you talk to customers 1-on-1.
Chats.how_to: Search for a contact at the top left. Select their name to open the conversation. You can send text, emojis, or documents just like standard WhatsApp.

Contacts / CRM.purpose: Managing your customer database and lead pipeline.
Contacts / CRM.how_to: Drag leads between stages (New -> Contacted -> Closed) to track your sales progress.

Settings.purpose: Configuring your WABA (WhatsApp Business API) credentials.
Settings.how_to: Obtain your credentials from the Meta Developers portal and paste them here to connect your live WhatsApp number.

faq.a: Yes, WBIZZ uses the Official WhatsApp Business Cloud API for 100% compliance.

faq.q: How many messages can I send?
faq.a: Depending on your Meta verification status, you can send between 1,000 to unlimited messages per 24 hours.
